description:
I downloaded to Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS.
Unfortunately it didn't have a pulse,..... alas to say.
My excitement was short lived.?️

so sad :(
It may be so cool

The positives are it works and has some great information in it; our five year old loves learning about dinosaurs. It is easy to navigate through and some useful filters. Swipe Left and Right, or just navigate through search and filter.

Some suggestions would be: having maps to help visualise the where the species was found, include other info like pictures of fossils, where in the world you can find displays (if they exist) and links to resources like video clips where people have already tried to model and animate the species. Pretty sure that there's clips on BBC from their Walking with Dinosaurs stuff and Andy's Dinosaurs, a lot of this stuff might have ended up as short clips on their website.

Would be brilliant if there was a way to bookmark species to create a personal inventory of favourites, maybe also include a line-art version of each picture so that children can print out and colour them in.

summary: Doesn't go past the intro screen
